title: Peter Norvig - Wikipedia
snippet: Peter Norvig (born 14 December 1956) is an American computer scientist and Distinguished Education Fellow at the Stanford Institute for Human-Centered AI. He previously served as a director of research and search quality at Google. Norvig is the co-author with Stuart J.

title: Peter Norvig Bio
snippet: Peter Norvig is a Fellow at Stanford's Human-Centered AI Institute and a researcher at Google Inc; previously he directed Google's core search algorithms group and Google's Research group. title: Peter Norvig - AI for Good
snippet: Peter Norvig is a Director of Research at Google Inc. Previously he was head of Google’s core search algorithms group, and of NASA Ames’s Computational Sciences Division, making him NASA’s senior computer scientist.
